ActFarm Credit Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHAEL HOFFORT of Buena Vista, Saskatchewan, as President and Chief Executive Officer of Farm Credit Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective July 1, 2019.
